key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on global suppliers for critical raw materials
Economic sensitivity tied to consumer spending on discretionary items
High market competition in bedding and furniture industries
Financial performance volatility and stock price declines
environmental_issues: Scrutiny over environmental footprint, particularly in energy-intensive manufacturing processes
governance_issues: Legal challenges impacting reputation and operational stability
